name: Appserv2015
body: ### Welcome to AppServ2015 website. Since author of Appserv don't update it very long time, I decided to build a new version of appserv called Appserv2015. Appserv2015 is an open project that is a merging open source software installer package for windows that has easy way to build webserver, databse server. The installer package includes： * Apache 2.4.16 * PHP 5.6.12 * MySQL 5.6.26 * phpMyAdmin 4.4.14 ### How to install Double click AppServ2015-1.0.0.exe. Just click next and next and next....until finish. If you start apacher error, you can try install Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2012 Update 4 (x86) and start apache again beause apache and php are compiled by visual stuio 2012. ### How to uninstall Double click uninstall.exe if you want to uninstall appserv2015. It will remove Appserv2015 folder but keep MySQL\data folder and www folder. ### Authors and Contributors Jyun-Hao Tang (tang7526@gmail.com)\\ Country：Taiwan ### Any question？ Let me know If you have any question. You can email to me, thanks.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
